name: remesapay
description: Blockchain remittance platform for Ecuador - instant, low-cost transfers

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:contracts"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:contracts
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:contracts
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:contracts
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contracts && npm run deploy:base-testnet && npm run deploy:optimism-testnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cd contracts && npm run deploy:base && npm run deploy:optimism
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install

author: RemesaPay Team
